channel.title: Hey! I'm Dave, and I'm bootstrapping SMS Inbox
channel.description:
Hi all! I've been lurking for a while, and decided it was time to set up an account.
I'm a software developer, working for a startup full-time by day and working on bootstrapped software projects whenever I can make time :slight_smile:
I just launched the first version of www.smsinbox.net, which is a drop-in messaging UI for Twilio apps. I'd love to hear any comments/questions/feedback you may have!
